tasks.title: Sync Modal Showing Stale Failed Sync Data
tasks.description: Sync window is showing all syncs as failing even though they were cleared and all images uploaded correctly. This appears to be stale cached data from previous failed attempts, not actual current failures.
acceptance_criteria: Sync modal shows accurate current sync status
Cleared syncs are removed from the failed list
No stale cached failure data persists after clearing
Sync status refreshes properly after manual clear
